disclaimer.title: Halal Scanner Disclaimer
disclaimer.message: This scanner only checks ingredients based on a keyword database. It does not provide an official halal ruling. Please use your own judgment before consuming.
disclaimer.verse: "O mankind, eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good..."
disclaimer.decline: No, I Don't Want to Use This Feature

details.title: How It Works
details.intro: This scanner checks product ingredients using OCR (Optical Character Recognition) and our curated halal ingredient database.

steps.ocr: OCR Processing ‚Äì The product image (taken by camera or uploaded from gallery) is sent to an OCR server, which reads and extracts the ingredient text from the image.
steps.translate: Translation ‚Äì If the detected text is in Chinese, it is sent to Google Translation to be converted into English for consistent checking.
steps.match: Database Matching ‚Äì The translated English ingredient list is checked against our curated database of keywords for halal, Muslim-friendly, syubhah, and haram indicators.
steps.display: Result Display ‚Äì Any matches are highlighted by category with their status shown for your reference.

halal.label: Halal
halal.desc: Has halal certification within the product.
halal.examples: Examples: Halal BPJPH Indonesia, Halal CMA, Halal TGM, Halal Thailand

muslimFriendly.label: Muslim-Friendly
muslimFriendly.desc: No Syubhah or Haram ingredients detected, but not officially halal certified.
muslimFriendly.examples: Examples: Lecithin (Soy), Soy Lecithin, Emulsifier (Sugar Cane), Fresh Cream

syubhah.label: Syubhah
syubhah.desc: Doubtful or unclear ingredients that may need further checking.
syubhah.examples: Examples: Unknown Emulsifier, Butter, Margarine, Vinegar

haram.label: Haram
haram.examples: Examples: Pork, Gelatin, Alcohol, Lard, Wine

details.disclaimerNote: Results are for reference only. Always verify with trusted sources before consuming.

legend.muslimFriendly: Permissible ingredient, but no halal certification
